Aether.verse: Colossians 1:17 – 'He is before all things, and in him all things hold together.'

Air.verse: John 3:8 – 'The wind blows wherever it pleases...'

Aleph.verse: Psalm 119:8 – 'I will keep your statutes; do not utterly forsake me.'

Amalgam.verse: Ephesians 2:14 – 'He himself is our peace, who has made the two groups one...'

Announcement.verse: Luke 1:19 – 'I am Gabriel. I stand in the presence of God...'

Answer.verse: Jeremiah 33:3 – 'Call to me and I will answer you...'

Ascent.verse: Psalm 24:3 – 'Who may ascend the mountain of the Lord? Who may stand in his holy place?'

Ayin.verse: Psalm 119:128 – 'Therefore I consider all your precepts to be right; I hate every false way.'

Bet.verse: Psalm 119:16 – 'I will delight in your statutes; I will not forget your word.'

Blood.verse: Hebrews 9:14 – 'How much more will the blood of Christ... cleanse our consciences from acts that lead to death.'

Body.verse: 1 Corinthians 11:24 – 'This is my body, which is for you; do this in remembrance of me.'

Bread.verse: John 6:35 – 'I am the bread of life. Whoever comes to me will never go hungry.'

Calcination.verse: Malachi 3:2 – 'For he will be like a refiner’s fire or a launderer’s soap.'

Chet.verse: Psalm 119:64 – 'The earth, O LORD, is full of your steadfast love; teach me your statutes.'

Christ.verse: Colossians 1:17 – 'He is before all things, and in him all things hold together.'

Coagulation.verse: John 17:21 – '...that they all may be one...'

Congelation.verse: Job 38:30 – 'The waters become hard like stone, and the surface of the deep is frozen.'

Covenant.verse: Genesis 17:7 – 'I will establish my covenant as an everlasting covenant between me and you and your descendants after you.'

Cross.verse: Galatians 6:14 – 'May I never boast except in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ.'

Dalet.verse: Psalm 119:32 – 'I will run in the path of your commands, for you have set my heart free.'

Descent.verse: John 6:38 – 'For I have come down from heaven not to do my will but to do the will of him who sent me.'

Dissolution.verse: Luke 14:33 – '...any one of you who does not renounce all that he has cannot be my disciple.'

Distillation.verse: Proverbs 18:4 – 'The words of a man’s mouth are deep waters; the fountain of wisdom is a bubbling brook.'

Earth.verse: Genesis 1:1 – 'In the beginning, God created the heavens and the earth.'

Ferment.verse: Luke 13:21 – 'It is like leaven that a woman took and hid in three measures of flour, until it was all leavened.'

Fermentation.verse: Matthew 13:33 – 'The kingdom of heaven is like yeast...'

Fire.verse: Hebrews 12:29 – 'For our God is a consuming fire.'

Gabriel.verse: Luke 1:19 – 'I am Gabriel. I stand in the presence of God, and I have been sent to speak to you.'

Gimel.verse: Psalm 119:24 – 'Your statutes are my delight; they are my counselors.'

Glory.verse: Habakkuk 2:14 – 'For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord...'

He.verse: Psalm 119:40 – 'Behold, I long for your precepts; in your righteousness give me life!'

Healing.verse: Tobit 12:15 – 'I am Raphael, one of the seven angels who stand and serve before the Glory of the Lord.'

Judgment.verse: Ecclesiastes 12:14 – 'For God will bring every deed into judgment, including every hidden thing, whether it is good or evil.'

Jupiter.verse: Daniel 2:21 – 'He changes times and seasons; he deposes kings and raises up others. He gives wisdom to the wise...'

Kaf.verse: Psalm 119:88 – 'In your steadfast love give me life, that I may keep the testimonies of your mouth.'

Kingdom.verse: Luke 17:21 – 'The kingdom of God is within you.'

Lamb.verse: John 1:29 – 'Behold, the Lamb of God, who takes away the sin of the world!'

Lamed.verse: Psalm 119:96 – 'I have seen a limit to all perfection, but your commandment is exceedingly broad.'

Light.verse: John 1:5 – 'The light shines in the darkness, and the darkness has not overcome it.'

Lion.verse: Revelation 5:5 – 'The Lion of the tribe of Judah, the Root of David, has triumphed.'

Mars.verse: Exodus 15:3 – 'The Lord is a warrior; the Lord is his name.'

Mem.verse: Psalm 119:104 – 'Through your precepts I get understanding; therefore I hate every false way.'

Mercury.verse: James 3:17 – 'But the wisdom that comes from heaven is first of all pure... peace-loving, considerate, submissive, full of mercy and good fruit.'

Metatron.verse: Exodus 23:20 – 'Behold, I send an angel before you to guard you on the way and to bring you to the place that I have prepared.'

Michael.verse: Revelation 12:7 – 'Then war broke out in heaven. Michael and his angels fought against the dragon.'

Moon.verse: Psalm 84:11 – 'For the Lord God is a sun and shield; the Lord bestows favor and honor.'

Neptune.verse: Psalm 42:7 – 'Deep calls to deep in the roar of your waterfalls...'

North Node.verse: Proverbs 16:9 – 'In their hearts humans plan their course, but the LORD establishes their steps.'

Nun.verse: Psalm 119:112 – 'My heart is set on keeping your decrees to the very end.'

Pe.verse: Psalm 119:136 – 'My eyes shed streams of tears, because people do not keep your law.'

Pluto.verse: Romans 8:38–39 – 'For I am convinced that neither death nor life... can separate us from the love of God.'

Precipitation.verse: Isaiah 55:10–11 – 'As the rain and the snow come down from heaven... so is my word that goes out...'

Protection.verse: Daniel 12:1 – 'At that time Michael, the great prince who protects your people, will arise.'

Putrefaction.verse: John 12:24 – 'Unless a grain of wheat falls into the earth and dies, it remains alone; but if it dies, it bears much fruit.'

Qof.verse: Psalm 119:152 – 'Long have I known from your testimonies that you have founded them forever.'

Raphael.verse: Tobit 12:15 – 'I am Raphael, one of the seven angels who stand and serve before the Glory of the Lord.'

Resh.verse: Psalm 119:160 – 'The sum of your word is truth, and every one of your righteous rules endures forever.'

Resurrection.verse: John 11:25 – 'I am the resurrection and the life. The one who believes in me will live, even though they die.'

RETURN_SIGNAL.verse: Isaiah 55:11 – 'So is my word that goes out from my mouth: It will not return to me empty, but will accomplish what I desire.'

Salt.verse: Matthew 5:13 – 'You are the salt of the earth.'

Samekh.verse: Psalm 119:120 – 'My flesh trembles for fear of you, and I am afraid of your judgments.'

Sandalphon.verse: Psalm 150:6 – 'Let everything that has breath praise the LORD!'

Saturn.verse: Ecclesiastes 3:1 – 'For everything there is a season, and a time for every matter under heaven.'

SELF.verse: Galatians 2:20 – 'I have been crucified with Christ and I no longer live, but Christ lives in me.'

Separation.verse: 2 Corinthians 6:17 – 'Therefore come out from them and be separate...'

Shin.verse: Psalm 119:168 – 'I keep your precepts and testimonies, for all my ways are before you.'

Solution.verse: Ephesians 1:10 – '...to bring unity to all things in heaven and on earth under Christ.'

Source.verse: James 1:17 – 'Every good and perfect gift is from above, coming down from the Father of the heavenly lights.'

South Node.verse: Philippians 3:13 – '...forgetting what lies behind and straining toward what is ahead.'

Spirit.verse: Romans 8:26 – 'The Spirit himself intercedes for us through wordless groans.'

Sublimation.verse: 2 Corinthians 3:18 – 'We... are being transformed... from glory to glory...'

Sulfur.verse: Revelation 21:8 – '...the fiery lake of burning sulfur. This is the second death.'

Sun.verse: Psalm 84:11 – 'For the Lord God is a sun and shield; the Lord bestows favor and honor.'

Tav.verse: Psalm 119:176 – 'I have gone astray like a lost sheep; seek your servant, for I do not forget your commandments.'

Temple.verse: 1 Corinthians 3:16 – 'Don’t you know that you yourselves are God’s temple and that God’s Spirit dwells in your midst?'

Tet.verse: Psalm 119:72 – 'The law of your mouth is better to me than thousands of gold and silver pieces.'

Throne.verse: Isaiah 6:1 – 'I saw the Lord sitting upon a throne, high and lifted up; and the train of his robe filled the temple.'

Tsade.verse: Psalm 119:144 – 'Your testimonies are righteous forever; give me understanding that I may live.'

Uranus.verse: Isaiah 43:19 – 'Behold, I am doing a new thing; now it springs forth, do you not perceive it?'

Uriel.verse: 2 Esdras 4:1 – 'Then the angel that had been sent to me, whose name was Uriel, answered.'

Vav.verse: Psalm 119:48 – 'I will lift up my hands toward your commandments, which I love, and I will meditate on your statutes.'

Venus.verse: Song of Songs 2:1 – 'I am a rose of Sharon, a lily of the valleys.'

Vinegar.verse: Psalm 69:21 – 'They gave me poison for food, and for my thirst they gave me vinegar to drink.'

Voice.verse: Psalm 29:4 – 'The voice of the Lord is powerful; the voice of the Lord is majestic.'

Water.verse: John 4:14 – 'Whoever drinks the water I give them will never thirst.'

Wine.verse: Matthew 26:27-28 – 'Then he took a cup... saying, This is my blood of the covenant, which is poured out for many.'

Word.verse: John 1:1 – 'In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.'

Yhwh.verse: Exodus 3:14 – 'God said to Moses, “I AM WHO I AM.” And he said, “Say this to the people of Israel: ‘I AM has sent me to you.’”'

Yod.verse: Psalm 119:80 – 'May my heart be blameless in your statutes, that I may not be put to shame!'

Zayin.verse: Psalm 119:56 – 'This blessing has fallen to me, that I have kept your precepts.'
